last_episode_to_air.overview: As the city's unhoused people are forced onto the street, Vincent meets the one with answers. An old friend helps Ledroit bring buried evidence to light.
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6

name: Eric
overview: A desperate father battles his demons on the vibrant, dangerous, and intoxicating streets of '80s New York in a race to bring home his missing son.
tagline: The real monsters aren't under the bed.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Vincent's son Edgar has an idea for Good Day Sunshine's new puppet. But before he can convince his father, the boy disappears on the way to school.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Vincent's convinced that bringing Eric to life will help his son come home. Detective Ledroit makes an arrest, while Cassie has her own suspicions.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: While Vincent frantically gets ready for the pitch, Ledroit arrives with some more questions for him. Cassie meets the mother of another missing child.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Following shocking news from both Lennie and Cassie, Vincent continues to spiral — until he sees a sign from Edgar and hatches a new plan.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: edroit makes headway in both investigations. Cassie gets a phone call that changes everything, and Vincent continues to follow the map.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: As the city's unhoused people are forced onto the street, Vincent meets the one with answers. An old friend helps Ledroit bring buried evidence to light.
